title: What is technology management and its importance? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technologies have made many of the newest innovations in our world today. We have been invested in many marketplace of technologies and innovations. Technology management is about expressing effective, strong policies that drive the company’s aggressive benefit. I visited a site where i got to know about the technologies and its importance. GTI works for technology management and innovation. Global tech interface is online portal for technologies Which is important for businesses and startups.
